properties.description: This initiative deploys Notification Assets for Azure Monitor Baseline Alerts. This includes the setup of an Alert Processing Rule and an Action Group to manage notifications and actions, along with a Notification Suppression Rule to manage alert notifications, as well as a Notification Suppression Rule to control alert notifications.
